SEARCH
Package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1

Class Library

Object
Library
public class Library extends Object
The Library class simulates a library system where Reader and Writer threads can concurrently access the library. It ensures that up to a maximum of 5 readers can read at the same time, but only one writer can write at a time. Readers and writers request access to the library, and their actions are managed using semaphores.

The class uses semaphores to synchronize the access to shared resources. It handles the scheduling of readers and writers, ensuring that they follow the correct access protocol.

  • Method Details

    • startReading

      public void startReading(Reader reader) throws InterruptedException
      Starts reading by a Reader thread. Acquires the necessary semaphores and updates the readers list.
      Parameters:
      reader - the Reader thread requesting to start reading
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while acquiring semaphores

    • stopReading

      public void stopReading(Reader reader) throws InterruptedException
      Stops reading by a Reader thread. Updates the readers list and releases the library access permit.
      Parameters:
      reader - the Reader thread requesting to stop reading
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while acquiring semaphores

    • startWriting

      public void startWriting(Writer writer) throws InterruptedException
      Starts writing by a Writer thread. Updates the awaiting list.
      Parameters:
      writer - the Writer thread requesting to start writing
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while acquiring semaphores

    • stopWriting

      public void stopWriting(Writer writer)
      Stops writing by a Writer thread and releases the library access permit for all readers.
      Parameters:
      writer - the Writer thread requesting to stop writing

    • requestWriting

      public void requestWriting(Writer writer) throws InterruptedException
      Requests writing access for a Writer thread. It adds the writer to the awaiting list and acquires the necessary library access permits.
      Parameters:
      writer - the Writer thread requesting writing access
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while acquiring semaphores

    • requestReading

      public void requestReading(Reader reader) throws InterruptedException
      Requests reading access for a Reader thread. It adds the reader to the awaiting list and acquires the necessary library access permit.
      Parameters:
      reader - the Reader thread requesting reading access
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while acquiring semaphores
